ygData.subject: SV: New Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t vote here, go to the website... http://www.onelist.com/surveycenter/EverQuest Btw, I would like to be able to sell or trade my items when I find
ygData.messageBody:
Don't vote here, go to the website...
http://www.onelist.com/surveycenter/EverQuest

Btw, I would like to be able to sell or trade my items when I find something better to replace them, or buy/trade it for something better.. I have considered quitting EQ because of NO DROP.. But that's my vote...

- Avron -

----- Original Message -----
From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 6:45 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] New Survey


> From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
>
> --- EverQuest-owner@... wrote:
> > Possible answers are:
> >
> > o NO DROP is the way to go.
> > o Hmm, level caps on items, that's better..
> > o Why not both at once?
>
> o NO DROP is the way to go.
>
> Level caps *suck*, take *all* the fun out of the game.
> Why should I have to wait until 30 or 35 for, say, a
> Blackened Iron Crown or Crested Helm if I can afford
> to buy, or can get a group to get, it at 20 or 25?
> I've played MUDs with level caps and would probably
> seriously consider quitting EQ if they institute them
> here.
>
> ===
> :D
> Dave's World
> -No matter where you go, there you are-
> "People will believe a lie either because they want to
> believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
> First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
